topic: Write a joke on Picture Frame
joke: Why did the picture frame go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little framed!

topic: Write a joke on A lawyer who's always arguing with themselves
joke: Why did the lawyer's argument with themselves go to court? Because it was a case of self-defense!

topic: Write a joke on A Cerebrus who loves belly rubs
joke: Why did Cerberus get kicked out of hell? Because every time someone tried to make a deal with the devil, he'd interrupt and ask "Belly rubs? Can I get belly rubs?"

topic: Write a joke on A clown with stage fright
joke: Why did the clown with stage fright bring a ladder to the performance? Because he wanted to take his fears to new heights!

topic: Write a joke on Continent
joke: Why did the continent go to therapy? Because it had a lot of "border" issues!

topic: Write a joke on Tablecloth
joke: Why did the tablecloth go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little "draped"!

topic: Write a joke on A painter who can't mix colors
joke: Why did the painter's career go down the drain? Because he always struggled to mix things up!

topic: Write a joke on City
joke: Why did the city go to therapy? Because it had a lot of "street" issues!

topic: Write a joke on A self aware Roomba
joke: Why did the self-aware Roomba go to therapy? Because it was struggling to sweep its feelings under the rug!

topic: Write a joke on Doubt
joke: I'm reading a book about doubt, but I'm not sure I believe it.

topic: Write a joke on Remote
joke: Why did the remote worker bring a ladder to the virtual meeting?

topic: Write a joke on Airplane
joke: Why did the airplane go to the doctor? Because it had a turbine!

topic: Write a joke on A gnome who's afraid of gardens
joke: Why did the gnome go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little "root"-less about its fear of gardens!

topic: Write a joke on Gate
joke: Why did the gate go to therapy? Because it had a lot of "bars" to overcome!

topic: Write a joke on A programmer who can't code
joke: A programmer who can't code is like a hair stylist who can't cut hair – they're just a liabilities manager.

topic: Write a joke on A hydra with stage fright
joke: Why did the hydra's stage fright go untreated? Because it had a hissy fit about seeking head!

topic: Write a joke on Time traveler with a broken time machine
joke: Why did the time traveler with a broken time machine was stuck in the past? Because it was a time-less solution!

topic: Write a joke on Driveway
joke: Why did DrivewayOnly go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little "paved" over!

topic: Write a joke on Self-driving car stuck in a roundabout
joke: Why did the self-driving car get stuck in a roundabout? Because it was programmed to always take the path of least resistance and it thought that meant never leaving!

topic: Write a joke on Shame
joke: Why did Shame go to the party? Because it felt guilty about having a good time!

topic: Write a joke on Sympathy
joke: Why did the sympathy card go to therapy? Because it always had to be sorry!

topic: Write a joke on A vegetarian tiger
joke: Why did the vegetarian tiger go to the party? Because it was a roar-some vegan occasion!

topic: Write a joke on A snoring dragon
joke: Why did the snoring dragon go to the doctor? Because it had a blazing sleep apnea!

topic: Write a joke on Optimism
joke: Why did the optimist's computer crash? Because it was having a positive outlook on its storage capacity!

topic: Write a joke on A ninja who trips over everything
joke: Why did the clumsy ninja go to the party? Because he wanted to have a "fall"-back plan!

topic: Write a joke on AI trying to understand sarcasm
joke: AI: "I've been trained on millions of examples, I'm 99.9% sure you're being sarcastic. But just to clarify, when you said 'Oh, great, just what I needed, another meeting,' you meant... the exact opposite of that, correct?"

topic: Write a joke on Spoon
joke: Why did the spoon get kicked out of the restaurant!

topic: Write a joke on A tailor with no sense of style
joke: Why did the tailor with no sense of style go out of business? Because he couldn't cut it!

topic: Write a joke on Fear
joke: Why did Fear go to the party? Because he heard it was a scream!

topic: Write a joke on A coffee machine that predicts the future
joke: Why did the coffee machine go to therapy? Because it was always brewing up predictions about the future and couldn't stop grinding out prophecies!

topic: Write a joke on A teacher who doesn't know anything
joke: Why did the teacher bring a ladder to school? Because she wanted to raise the level of her ignorance!

topic: Write a joke on An artist who can only draw stick figures
joke: Why did the stick figure artist break up with his girlfriend? Because he couldn't draw attention to their relationship!

topic: Write a joke on Pin
joke: Why did Pinterest go to therapy?

topic: Write a joke on A magician who always reveals their tricks
joke: Why did the magician's career disappear? Because he always pulled back the curtain!

topic: Write a joke on A talking tree giving bad advice
joke: Why did the adventurer take a job at the local sewage plant? Because a talking tree told him it would be a "growing" opportunity!

topic: Write a joke on Telescope
joke: Why did the telescope go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little distant.

topic: Write a joke on Glass
joke: Why did the glass go to therapy?

topic: Write a joke on A firefighter who's afraid of fire
joke: Why did the firefighter bring a fire extinguisher to the party? Because he was a little "hot-headed" and wanted to have a "blaze" of a good time, but in reality, he was just trying to overcome his flaming fear of flames!
